entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 48 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 30 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow late in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 30 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 48 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Thursday 09 February 2023
